message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,900,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,600,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the value.  To be fair to both of us, I could come down to $1,750,000.  This offer represents a significant discount from my initial asking price and still reflects the true value of this product.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above $1,750,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,700,000. This is the highest I'm willing to go.
